attributes.action: Save adventure playground and youth club from closing
attributes.additional_details: Please save our adventure play ground and youth club from being closed. as it is such a important part of the community,if these places close,our children will have no where to go, and will end up on the streets. Up to no good, and become easy targets for gang recuiting and drug dealers. Please support us,the partition is for the Newtown youth club and adventure playground southampton,but I hope it helps all youth clubs and playgrounds across uk. thank you

rejection.details: This is one for the local authority to answer, not the Government.  However, you may want to get your local MP involved?
